title: Crime Alert 07.01.19
itunes:title: Crime Alert 07.01.19
description:
Florida 8 year old shot by her mother. Ohio track coach arrested for attempted assault on student. New technology aids in the search for missing girl with the release of six second ransom demand.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
